item.title: Hello world
item.description: Hello world in Go Here’s an example of hello world in Go: package main import "fmt" func main() { fmt.Println("hello world") } Hello world in Rust And here an example in Rust: fn main() { println!("Hello World!"); } Hello world in Python Finally hello world in python print("Hello World") Hello world in Bash Mosly to test images It all seems to work quite nicely. I am happy with my first post.
